A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought the movie was good. It had its flaws\, but so does every Star Wars movie. The comedy went a little overboard sometimes but overall it was good\, the characters had some growing pains but that’s natural for a story\, and some of the plot you go WTF and really?? \, but it wasn’t that bad. People are mainly mad because they expected to get everything answered but only a few things do and also the movie (as Luke says) doesn’t go the way people think. But there were a lot of cool things to this film. It had great cinematography\, nice character development and some cool scenes. Don’t listen to the bandwagon consensus that this movie is worse than any of the prequels.
